product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and elegant layout centered around a fashion product. The background consists of soft mint green tones with layered abstract wave shapes and subtle circular accents for added visual depth. A high-quality product image (id: `product_image`) is centrally placed, drawing immediate attention. The headline text (`heading`) is bold and clean, complemented by a sub-tagline (`tagline`) in a sleek sans-serif font. Below the product, there's a descriptive label (`description`) and prominently styled price (`price`) in a bold green shade. A rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) embeds a contrasting white text (`cta`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Mint Green: `#bde9c9`
- Deep Forest Green: `#28572a`
- Dark Grey: `#707070`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Accent Green Overlay: `#027223` (with opacity)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated and elegant color palette. The primary color of the handbag is a warm, muted camel brown (#A96E4F), giving it a rich, classy feel. Gold metallic accents (#D4AF37) are used effectively on the clasps, chains, and charms, creating a luxurious contrast against the matte leather texture. The subtle texture in the brown adds depth while maintaining a minimalist look. These colors blend seamlessly yet stand out distinctly, highlighting both functionality and style. For an effective advertisement banner, pair the brown and gold with off-white (#F5F5F5) or soft beige (#E8D8C3) backgrounds to maintain elegance and draw focus.
